column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I've been here several times
column2: and only once was I disappointed with some of the tapas plates.  This past Friday was fairly eventful
column4: when a candle exploded on us.  Not kidding.  We were sitting at the bar eating where they had a candle burning in a glass holder on top of the sangria tap
column5: and then POP! glass everywhere.  I thought I was in the Wild West being shot at!  Not that smart to keep hot glass on top of cold metal
column6: but we were fine and the manager took our pitcher and one of the tapas dishes off.  It was very nice of him.
